Overview
Overview / Product overview / Features / Datastream transforms
Datastream transforms
These features provide support for converting jobs in one datastream to another.
In this section:
Advanced Transform
The Advanced Transform feature is a customizable component. You can purchase transforms for the input and output data streams that you
need.
RICOH Transform features
RICOH Transform features provide a powerful and cost-effective system for transforming jobs to or from the format for AFP printing.
Parent topic: Features
1 of 1
